description: Master Cost Accounting Standards (CAS) issued by ICMAI for uniformity in cost measurement and reporting

slides.title: Welcome to Cost Accounting Standards
slides.content:
# Cost Accounting Standards (CAS)

CAS provide **uniform framework** for cost measurement.

## What You Will Learn

- **CAS Framework** - Structure and scope
- **Key Standards** - Individual CAS
- **Application** - Implementation
- **Compliance** - Requirements

## CAS Overview

| Aspect | Details |
|--------|--------|
| Issued by | ICMAI |
| Purpose | Uniformity |
| Total | 24 standards |
| Mandatory | For cost audit |

slides.title: CAS 1 - Classification
slides.content:
# Classification of Cost

## By Nature

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Material | Raw materials |
| Labor | Wages |
| Expenses | Rent, power |

## By Function

| Function | Costs |
|----------|-------|
| Production | Manufacturing |
| Administration | Office |
| Selling | Marketing |

## By Behavior

| Behavior | Pattern |
|----------|--------|
| Fixed | Constant total |
| Variable | Per unit constant |
| Semi-variable | Mixed |

slides.title: CAS 2 - Capacity Determination
slides.content:
# Capacity Concepts

## Types of Capacity

| Type | Definition |
|------|------------|
| Installed | Maximum possible |
| Practical | Normal conditions |
| Normal | Average over period |
| Actual | Currently used |

## Capacity Utilization

```
Capacity Utilization = Actual / Normal x 100
```

## Idle Capacity

| Reason | Treatment |
|--------|----------|
| Normal | Include in cost |
| Abnormal | Write off |

slides.title: CAS 3 - Overheads
slides.content:
# Production Overheads

## Components

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Factory | Rent, power |
| Indirect labor | Supervisors |
| Indirect material | Lubricants |

## Allocation Bases

| Base | When Used |
|------|----------|
| Direct labor hours | Labor intensive |
| Machine hours | Machine intensive |
| Floor area | Space-related |

## Treatment

- Normal overheads: Include
- Abnormal: Exclude

slides.title: CAS 4 - Cost of Production
slides.content:
# Production for Captive Consumption

## Components

```
Direct Material
+ Direct Labor
+ Direct Expenses
+ Production Overheads
= Cost of Production
```

## Valuation Basis

| Situation | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Normal capacity | Standard cost |
| Transfer | Cost of production |

## Exclusions

- Selling costs
- Distribution costs
- Finance costs

slides.title: CAS 5 - Average Cost Method
slides.content:
# Weighted Average

## Formula

```
Weighted Average = (Opening + Purchases) / Total Qty
```

## Application

| Element | Treatment |
|---------|----------|
| Issues | At average rate |
| Returns | At issue rate |
| Transfers | At average |

## Advantages

- Smooths price fluctuations
- Simple calculation
- Widely used

slides.title: CAS 6 - Direct Expenses
slides.content:
# Foreign Exchange

## Treatment

| Transaction | Rate |
|-------------|------|
| Initial | Transaction date |
| Monetary | Closing rate |
| Non-monetary | Historic rate |

## Exchange Difference

```
Difference = Recorded - Actual

Adjust:
- Revenue: Through P&L
- Capital: To asset cost
```

slides.title: CAS 7-10 - Employee Costs
slides.content:
# Employee Related Costs

## CAS 7 - Employee Cost

| Component | Include |
|-----------|--------|
| Salary | Direct |
| Benefits | Allocated |
| Bonus | Spread evenly |

## CAS 8 - Cost of Utilities

- Power, water, steam
- Based on consumption

## CAS 9 - Packing

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Primary | Product cost |
| Secondary | Selling cost |

## CAS 10 - Direct Expenses

- Traceable to cost object
- Excludes overheads

slides.title: CAS 11-14 - Various Costs
slides.content:
# Administrative & Other Costs

## CAS 11 - Administrative Overheads

- General management
- Not production related
- Allocate to cost centers

## CAS 12 - Repairs & Maintenance

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Routine | Expense |
| Major | Capitalize |

## CAS 13 - Cost of Service Centre

- Step-down allocation
- Reciprocal method

## CAS 14 - Pollution Control

- Compliance costs
- Clean-up costs

slides.title: CAS 15-18 - Selling & Finance
slides.content:
# Distribution & Finance

## CAS 15 - Selling Overheads

| Include | Exclude |
|---------|--------|
| Advertising | Bad debts |
| Commission | Interest |
| Warehousing | Abnormal |

## CAS 16 - Depreciation

- Systematic allocation
- Over useful life
- Method per policy

## CAS 17 - Interest & Finance

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Borrowing | Per policy |
| Trade | Not cost of borrowing |

## CAS 18 - R&D

- Research: Expense
- Development: Capitalize if criteria met

slides.content:
# Cost Records Compliance

## Maintenance

| Requirement | Details |
|-------------|--------|
| Format | CRA-1 |
| Period | Financial year |
